attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the US there is a show, in which predators who want sex from children are lured to a location and then cornered and exposed for the monsters that they are. This both lets the public know that they don't want theese people near their children, and also produces great results, such as catching hundreds of predators, which would have otherwise would have had to have commit the crime before being caught. Also this would scare away most of the pedophiles who would otherwise have little to fear from a society more concerned with their rights, than the rights of it's children.
